CustomField.description: JSON representation of tool dependencies generated by LLM analysis. Defines which tools must execute before others. Format: {"version":"1.0","dependencies":{"update_record":["get_record"],"send_email":["update_record"]}}. The graph is generated at design-time and should be reviewed before enabling validation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The dependency graph that defines tool execution order. Use the Generate Graph action to create this automatically, then review before enabling dependency validation.
CustomField.label: Tool Dependency Graph
